Articles.Content:
Just a basic WIP part designed to be droppable from any craft and it will distract the enemys guns.

Simply put you just drop it off your ship any ship, and the targeted enemy will think its an incoming missile and stop trying to kill you and will instead try to shoot the decoy.

allowing you time to fire your doomsday weapon or whatever it is your firing.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/nQOPm)

[http://www./download/nk1d9n4fywmr7dl/Decoy.zip](http://www./download/nk1d9n4fywmr7dl/Decoy.zip)

License for BDarmory [CC-BY-SA](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/)

As for the decoy? DO AS YOU LIKE

I cant test it because my pc wont play ksp right now but maybe someone can test it for me.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-11T21:34:09Z" title="05/11/2015 09:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 11, 2015</time> by daniel l.**

No pics, no clicks. 

Please add picks.

Also, this should be in Development thread, not release thread.

No pics because my pc wont actually work right now so i cant even test it. As for the wrong place i wasnt looking when i made the thread ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

So you send us parts you cant test in a thread you do not care about...

Mmmkay...

> 
> So you send us parts you cant test in a thread you do not care about...
> Mmmkay...

i do care but my pc is acting up right now i just wanted to show what i was starting so maybe they could help me finish it.

C'mon guys, he made it pretty clear that he can't post any screenshots.

Here are a few pics:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/nQOPm)

As for the mod itself, the decoy is a freefall white hellfire that does exactly what it is described to do. Although the decoy uses no propulsion so you have to launch it well before you fire any missiles, adding an element of complexity to using the decoy.

Might I suggest a powered decoy that costs more, but flies like an actual missile with some form of propulsion.

I would recommend a custom model for the sake of originality if you don't know how to make one i would be happy to make one for you PM me if you would like
